title: Midnight Driver Download
description:
Get Midnight Driver for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRiP
The racing simulator “Midnight Driver ” will immerse you in the prime of Japanese street racing. Twisting mountain tracks await you, where the ability to use controlled skid will help you overcome turns faster than your rivals. The game contains iconic cars that you will unlock as you progress. Interesting locations with unique tracks await you, you can participate in a race uphill or downhill , which radically changes the driving style.
Dive into the golden era of Japanese street racing. Choose from a list of iconic cars and perfect your driving skills in beautiful mountain roads. Challenge your friends and rivals in downhill or uphill battles. At night, the streets are yours. 13 (More coming soon) iconic cars representing the spirit of golden era of street racing in mountain passes. 16 Beautiful courses to choose from of which 2 are several courses combined into one bigger open location. Chose to race downhill or uphill. Up to 4 player multiplayer to race or drive around gorgeous mountain passes. art of rally
